alert.note: Alert for Northern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Craven County through 500 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorm near Ernul, or 11 miles north of New Bern, moving slowly northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Vanceboro, Askins, Cayton, Fort Barnwell, Jasper and Ernul. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
